name: Pixboy
description:
Help Pixboy with his revenge against malicious dogs in this arcade 2D platformer!
Feel the true retro vibes with chunky pixels and chiptune music, use this game to travel back to the '90s!

Features:
+ 4 unique worlds with different mechanics inside
+ 40 hand-crafted levels
+ 150+ secret rooms
+ 30 different enemies
+ 24 retro color palettes
+ 4 bosses
+ 4 challenges per level
+ a Pacifist Badge for sparing all enemies
